info.name: Pastel Color Twitter
info.description: Simply make twitter pastel colored. Blue goes gray. Special thanks to SchemeColor.com https://www.schemecolor.com/ for color schemes Try other our userstyles for Twitter: - Twitter RT Button Outlined - Fast Twitter 2020 ---------- Twitterの色をパステルカラーに変更します。おまけで青は灰色になります。
info.additionalInfo:
2020/7/17 fix lost highlight for default mode
2020/7/16 add highlight for dim & dark mode
2020/7/11 fix emoji is hidden on dim & dark mode
2020/7/5 fix pink hovered twitter button (we are very sorry for that!), remove shadows, change default light gray liked color
2020/6/14 add support for all colors
2020/6/13 initial release supports Pink & Purple.
